languages.text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.
languages.original_text:
Once per combat for 1 round the Astra Militarum commander and all their allies deal no damage to allies and deal an additional +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% damage to enemies that were already attacked by one of their allies.
Does not stack from multiple Astra Militarum commanders.

traits.locale_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

"When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allies' attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since the ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
Der Astra Militarum-Commander und seine Verbündeten erleiden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang keinen Schaden durch Angriffe von Verbündeten. Außerdem fügen sie Gegnern, die von ihnen seit der Aktivierung der Fähigkeit attackiert wurden, +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % mehr Schaden zu. Sind mehrere Astra Militarum-Commander im Kampf, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Der Astra Militarum-Commander und seine Verbündeten erleiden 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang keinen Schaden durch Angriffe von Verbündeten. Außerdem fügen sie Gegnern, die von ihnen seit der Aktivierung der Fähigkeit attackiert wurden, +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % mehr Schaden zu. Sind mehrere Astra Militarum-Commander im Kampf, wird der Effekt nicht gestapelt.
! Kann nur einmal pro Kampf eingesetzt werden.

languages.text:
Lorsque la capacité est utilisée, pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le commandant de l'Astra Militarum et ses alliés ne subissent aucun dégât lors des attaques alliées, et ils infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % de dégâts supplémentaires aux ennemis qu'ils ont attaqués depuis l'activation de la capacité. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si plusieurs commandants de l'Astra Militarum participent au combat.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsque la capacité est utilisée, pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, le commandant de l'Astra Militarum et ses alliés ne subissent aucun dégât lors des attaques alliées, et ils infligent +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % de dégâts supplémentaires aux ennemis qu'ils ont attaqués depuis l'activation de la capacité. Cet effet n'est pas cumulable si plusieurs commandants de l'Astra Militarum participent au combat.
! Utilisable une fois par combat.

languages.text:
使用此能力后，星界军指挥官与其盟友在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内不会受到友军伤害。星界军指挥官与其盟友攻击敌人时，如果该名敌人在此能力发动之后已经被攻击过，则此次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}%。如果战场上存在多名星界军指挥官，此能力效果不会叠加。
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
使用此能力后，星界军指挥官与其盟友在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内不会受到友军伤害。星界军指挥官与其盟友攻击敌人时，如果该名敌人在此能力发动之后已经被攻击过，则此次攻击造成的伤害提高{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}%。如果战场上存在多名星界军指挥官，此能力效果不会叠加。
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

languages.text:
Cuando se usa, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} el comandante del Astra Militarum y sus aliados no sufren daño por los ataques de aliados e infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % de daño adicional a los enemigos que hayan sido atacados por ellos desde el momento en que se activó la capacidad. Si hay varios comandantes del Astra Militarum participando en el combate, este efecto no se acumula.
! Solo puede usarse una vez por combate.
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando se usa, durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} el comandante del Astra Militarum y sus aliados no sufren daño por los ataques de aliados e infligen un +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} % de daño adicional a los enemigos que hayan sido atacados por ellos desde el momento en que se activó la capacidad. Si hay varios comandantes del Astra Militarum participando en el combate, este efecto no se acumula.
! Solo puede usarse una vez por combate.

languages.text:
使用時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}の間、帝国防衛軍司令とその味方は味方の攻撃によるダメージを受けず、能力発動以降に攻撃した敵に対して+{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}%の追加ダメージを与える。複数の帝国防衛軍司令が戦闘にいる場合、この効果は重複しない。
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

languages.text:
При активации способности в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} командир Астра Милитарум и его союзники не получают урон друг от друга и наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% больше урона врагам, которых они уже атаковали с момента активации. Если в бою находится несколько командиров Астра Милитарум, то эффект не суммируется.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allies' attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since the ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
После активации эффекта и до конца текущего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} командир Астра Милитарум и его союзники наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% больше урона врагам и не получают урон друг от друга. Если в бою находится несколько командиров Астра Милитарум, то эффект не суммируется.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

После активации эффекта и до конца текущего {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} командир Астра Милитарум и его союзники наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% больше урона врагам и не получают урон друг от друга. Если в бою находится несколько командиров Астра Милитарум, то эффект не суммируется.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

При активации способности в течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} командир Астра Милитарум и его союзники не получают урон друг от друга и наносят на {uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% больше урона врагам, которых они уже атаковали с момента активации. Если в бою находится несколько командиров Астра Милитарум, то эффект не суммируется.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

languages.text:
Kullanıldığında Astra Militarum komutanı ve dost birimleri, dost birimlerin saldırılarından hasar almazlar ve kabiliyet etkinleştirildikten sonra saldırdıkları düşmanlara +%{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a} daha fazla hasar verirler. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Çatışmada birden fazla Astra Militarum komutanı varsa etki üst üste birikmez.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
languages.original_text:
When used, for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} the Astra Militarum commander and their allies do not suffer damage from allied attacks and deal +{uip|DamageBonus|e6a279ca5979435fbb0d39d9d60d7f8a}% more damage to enemies that were attacked by them since ability activation. If multiple Astra Militarum commanders are in combat, the effect does not stack.
! Can only be used once per combat.

Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Çatışmada birden fazla Astra Militarum komutanı varsa etki üst üste birikmez.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.
